name: Gay Telegram Hub
tagline: The largest gay NSFW community on Telegram with content and social groups
description: Gay Telegram Hub serves as the central community for gay NSFW content on Telegram. The channel combines content sharing with community building, linking to regional chat groups, dating sub-groups, and content channels. It's one of the most organized LGBTQ+ spaces on Telegram, with active moderation against harassment and strict community guidelines. Content ranges from professional to amateur.
